name: Bionic
description:
Downloading a standalone version is recommended as the browser version is slower.

Note: Go here to get a list of map urls you can import into Bionic as custom maps!

The aim of this first person shooter game is to give players an opportunity to enjoy a simplistic yet engaging free multiplayer experience inside a browser. In the new Beta version, you can browse custom maps to play on!

New: See the video tutorial on making Custom Maps!

See what it's all about in the original trailer. Also take a look at Trench's Timelapse video!

You can follow on Twitter for updates!

Try my other project, Enchain! Please leave feedback... Please donate below if you appreciate and want to support this one man project.
